description:
The Task:
---

Write the class `Bezier` which accepts n control `points` **(pairs of floats)** and has an `evaluate` function taking a parametric value `t` that returns the point on the curve

if you are really stuck you can find a big clue [here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/B%C3%A9zier_curve#General_definition)

examples:
```python
bezier = Bezier((0,0),(1,1))
bezier.evaluate(0.0) # (0, 0)
bezier.evaluate(0.1) # (0.1, 0.1)
bezier.evaluate(0.2) # (0.2, 0.2)
bezier.evaluate(0.3) # (0.3, 0.3)
bezier.evaluate(0.4) # (0.4, 0.4)
bezier.evaluate(0.5) # (0.5, 0.5)
bezier.evaluate(0.6) # (0.6, 0.6)
bezier.evaluate(0.7) # (0.7, 0.7)
bezier.evaluate(0.8) # (0.8, 0.8)
bezier.evaluate(0.9) # (0.9, 0.9)
bezier.evaluate(1.0) # (1, 1)
```

**all necessary values will be floats** and **there will be more than 2 `points`** so no need to check


good luck and have fun!
